review: I got this because it was $20.  It really is only useful if you have Prime.  The interface is fine and the device works but it is not customizable and it really doesn't fit with Apple share unless you buy the correct app.  I also hate the device for typing, so that's why I want to use my Ipad.  This probably would be WAY more useful for someone with a Fire device.  But, I am still happy with it because it does work just like advertized.  e
